Articles.Content:
Gets two Darth Vaders.

Inserts an unpressed penny, i.e. a flat penny-sized disk of zinc coated in copper.

gets stamped penny

inserts 3 as in the number

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-30T21:37:37Z" title="11/30/2016 09:37  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 30, 2016</time> by StupidAndy**

Gets the third item in the machine which  happens to be Rokomax certified rocketfue...SODA. Orange soda, in fact. In very a familiar looking container. Oh and you can lick the bottle and it tastes like oranges.

Inserts KSP version 0.0000000001

Receive random connector pin from your CPU.

Inserts remainder of CPU

Gets the CPU separated into elemental form, in labeled beakers.

Inserts carbon from CPU

Receives carbon back in it's allotropic diamond form. Congratulations!

Inserts quartz crystal

Gets...nothing. The quartz crystals have jammed the vending machine.

Inserts mini-Jeb to try and fix the machine.

gets a SVMR (solid vending machine rocket)

inserts a dime

Gets nothing, insert $1.20 more, please.

Inserts remaining $1.20

Gets one gold bar.

Inserts a radio

Received old radial tire.

Inserts 27 used Post-It notes.

Gets 27 new Post-It notes.

Inserts <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>

gets bigger <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>

inserts a burrito

Gets a taco

Inserts a vending machine

Gets a vending machine filled with eggs.

Inserts fossilized dinosaur tail

gets unfossilized dinosaur tail thats still wiggling like a gecko tail

inserts everything

Gets antimatter.

Inserts an IOU slip

Receives national debt of all countries.

Inserts a quatloo.

Receives 2 Bars of Gold-Pressed Latinum and a rant from Quark  

Inserts a Rubix Cube

Receives cube back, but all sides painted same color.

Inserts Cubic Octagonal Strut.

Gets Two Cubic Octagonal Struts.

Inserts Jeb.

Gets Val back.

Inserts Australia.

Receives prison colony.

Inserts old arcade machine version of "Galaga"

Receives a software error due to old age.

Inserts [@Xorth Tanovar](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/71205-xorth-tanovar/)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-15T23:49:49Z" title="12/15/2016 11:49  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 15, 2016</time> by SAS123**

Receives transcript of early 90's-era PBM game.

Inserts single sheet of blank paper
